title: Doubly Gifted: The Author As Visual Artist
description: With 140 reproductions representing sixty-eight authors, this book exhibits the artwork of such great literary figures as William Blake, Charlotte Bronte, T.S. Eliot, William Faulkner, Herman Hesse, Victor Hugo, Henrik Ibsen, D.H. Lawrence, Edgar Allan Poe, and Tennessee Williams
author: Kathleen G. Hjerter
